item.title: Dates in R
item.description: Introduction and Motivation Converting to Objects of Class “Date” Lubridate Inconvenient or Uncommon Cases Operations with Dates Using Dates to Manipulate Datasets Tracking Values with Respect to Time Linear Regression Using Time Data Conclusion References: ## You'll need to have the following packages installed and loaded: library(lubridate) # For dealing with dates library(ggplot2) # For creating visuals and plots library(dplyr) # For working with the data library(readr) # For importing csv data files Introduction and Motivation We have many ways of writing down and understanding dates in English.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
